projects.title: Mental health Assistant | @ Compassion AI, Chicago
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered mental health assistant designed to help psychotherapists improve and standardize the quality of care they provide to clients.

projects.title: Smart COVID Clinic Website | @ Capgemini, Mumbai
projects.description: Built a full-stack web application (ReactJS, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL) for streamlined clinic scheduling and doctor-patient appointment management, featuring a responsive, role-based booking interface and robust REST APIs.

projects.title: E-Commerce Website | Personal Project
projects.description: Designed and launched a dynamic e-commerce site utilizing Spring Boot (Java), React, and a microservices architecture, optimizing performance with Redis caching and parallel processing.

projects.title: Interactive Data Visualization for Demographic Analysis | Academic Project @ ASU
projects.description: Created dynamic visualizations with D3.js, including radial bubble charts and network graphs, to enhance interactive demographic analysis and user engagement.

projects.title: Predictive Modeling for Term Deposit Subscription | Academic Project @ ASU
projects.description: Built predictive analytics pipelines using ensemble methods and transformer architectures for term deposit subscription, outperforming traditional modeling techniques.

projects.title: Tele-Medicine Consultation App | Academic Project @ ASU
projects.description: Developed a location-aware Android tele-consultation app using Google Maps API, featuring modular components for appointments, patient records, real-time geolocation, and user input validation.
